name: Diagram: Pyro Treasure Compass
desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Pyro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Natlan.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Objective</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reward</color>
Reach Tribe Reputation Level 4 with 3 tribes in Natlan

customize.name: Diagram: Pyro Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Pyro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Natlan.

customize.name: Pyro Treasure Compass
customize.desc:
A compass that can be used in Natlan to search for nearby chests.
Amidst the turmoil and strife that wrack the land, many treasures throughout the vast Nation of Pyro have gone unaccounted for, all trace of their whereabouts lost.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Golden Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

customize.name: Saurian Claw Succulent
customize.desc: A succulent shaped like the paw of a great animal.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Diagram: Anemo Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Anemo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Mondstadt.
